Title: Requires landlords to provide notice of rental history upon the signing of a vacancy lease
Summary: Requires landlords to provide notice of rental history upon the signing of a vacancy lease for the four years prior to the vacancy.
LawCode: Add ยง26-517.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring landlords to provide notice of rental history upon the signing of a vacancy lease
